general.title: Boys & Girls Club Ohio Alliance
general.subtitle: Social Return on Investment Impact Calculator created by
general.description: Social Return on Investment (SROI) is a method of calculating and communicating estimated impact using dollar values. SROI estimates the social value created by an organization’s activities, products, services or community initiatives. SROI combines social, economic, and environmental impacts into a comprehensive financial measurement of social value in a holistic estimate of impact.

proxy_values.description: Cost of harm from underage drinking per youth (traffic crashes, violent crime, property crime, unintentional injury, high-risk sex) with CPI Adjustment to 2024 dollars
